i drink a lot of tea.

content.text: Hi Bard, how is your day going?
Good! I'm learning more about people every day. How about you?
It's going well. I'm looking forward to spending some time with family this weekend.
That sounds like fun! What do you like to do with your family?
We love to go to concerts and dance our hearts out. We also enjoy golfing and going to the beach.
Those all sound like great ways to spend time together. I can't dance, but I love to golf and go to the beach.
It's never too late to learn to dance! I'm sure you would be great at it.
Thanks, maybe I'll give it a try. What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I love all kinds of music, but I'm especially fond of country music.
Me too! I love the energy and the stories in country music.
Me too. It's so much fun to sing along to.
I know, right? It's the best.
